author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: تقلید و تقیید و تحدید بوده و خواهند بود توحید آن است که یک را یک دانند و مقدّس از اعداد شمرند نه آنکه دو
translation: He is a true believer in Divine unity who, far from confusing duality with oneness, refuseth to allow any notion of multiplicity to becloud his conception of the singleness of God, who will regard the Divine Being as One Who, by His very nature, transcendeth the limitations of numbers.
